title: Adjustable Fridge Stand 8 Strong Feet, Washing Machine Stand Base, Universal Stand Base Refrigerator Stand, Easy to Move & Moisture-proof, for Furniture Portable Refrigerator Dryer Stand - Grey

all_images.alt: Adjustable Fridge Stand 8 Strong Feet, Washing Machine Stand Base, Universal Stand Base Refrigerator Stand, Easy to Move & Moisture-proof, for Furniture Portable Refrigerator Dryer Stand - Grey

raw_desc: 【GREAT FAMILY HELPER】 - Worry about dripping water or potential danger when put the fridge on carpets, annoy by the distance of dryer to destination? The mobile furniture stand base can help you solve these problem, make home life easier. 【ADJUSTABLE SIZE】This mobile base can be adjusted from 16 inches to 26 inches. Measure your appliance before purchase. There are 8 height adjustable feet with suction cup, they will hold your appliance firmly. Maximum weight it can handle is 600 lbs.Because once you add water and clothes into it, total weight will be over 500 lbs. If you have an appliance longer OR wider than 26 inches, you CAN'T use this leg support. 【Noise reduction and Anti-Vibration】This roller base is equipped with black anti-vibration rubber pads, which can reduce slipping movement, stabilize the washer, reduce the noise. The moving roller is applied at the bottom of appliances (portable washing machines, washer and dryer, refrigerator or mini fridge). It lifts the appliance up to 5" higher from the floor. Less humidity will extend the life cycle of the washing machine and dryer. 【DURABLE CONSTRUCTION】Our washer stand washing machine pedestal comes with bigger 8" platform. It will hold weight up to 600 lbs. Upgraded version takes 1 minutes to install. All feet and wheels were installed. You just need to install the frame and lock in the right position. 【MULTI-USE】The appliance rollers also move furniture or appliance easily like rolling dollies. 4 DOUBLE swivel casters come with lock. Lock your washer dolly once it is in the right position. Lock on the wheel need to be COMPLETELY lifted if you want to move the unit. Lock the frame COMPLETELY after installation. Otherwise the pole will move and leg support will shake.
